name: Durex Extra Safe
description: Durex Extra Safe Condoms have been designed to offer you maximum protection during sex. Made from slightly thicker latex and extra silicone lubrication, Extra Safe Condoms can offer peace of mind without having to forfeit any of the pleasure. Relax and let yourself go. Remember no method of contraception works 100% against pregnancy, HIV or sexually transmitted infections. It’s good to be in the know, so read the info inside, especially if you are using condoms for anal or oral sex. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
